Name: Astrea
Text: Ho Ho ho. Well done knight! You just managed to survive.

Name: Astrea
Text: That old zealot certainly gave you trouble. I'm glad I'll be no longer hearing his prayers.

Name: Aragorn
Text: Please tell me that was the last of them. I think I need to sit down for a minute.

Name: Aragorn
Text: This is no time to rest! You still must descend into the catacombs of this castle. You can rest when your dead.

Name: Aragorn
Text: You are right. I have to keep going and face what lies ahead.

Name: Astrea
Text: Good! Now move forward and put your new magical ability to use!
